articles.title: Teenage sensation Nick Griggs breaks European U20 indoor mile record - Independent.ie
articles.description: After a year spent rampaging through the record books, this was the most ridiculous performance of all.
articles.content:

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Football: Sanctions on Abramovich see restrictions placed on Chelsea - The Star Online
articles.description: LONDON: European and world soccer champion Chelsea was among the assets of Roman Abramovich frozen by the British government on Thursday (March 10) after he was sanctioned for his close relationship with Russian President Vladimir Putin.
